other_tests.procedure_name: Feces test for C. difficile toxin A & B
other_tests.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA. (Reference Range-Negative).

Numerous gallstones, distended gallbladder measuring 6.1 cm, new wall thickening, stable fluid- and gas-containing collection in the splenectomy bed measuring 3.7 x 3.6 cm, recurrent fluid- and gas-containing collection measuring 4.7 x 3.5 cm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Gallbladder distension increased; stable size of the collection in the splenectomy bed (previously 3.8 x 3.8 cm) and new wall thickening observed.
